Text: Thank you for this. With Demonoid down, late sci/fi and fantasy is a bit hard to come by. Do you have any tips on where to find these?
Demonoid please reutrn to us RIP

I'm always amazed at idiots that encode audiobooks down to 32 kbps...All you do is fuck it up and make it sound like the narrator is talking in a tunnel. Shame on you. 

Go look for a better quality rip from someone that knows what their doing. 64kbps is decent, but 192 is the lowest anyone should go. I don't give a shit what it is.

The problem with Pirate Bay is the fact that there are no standards to uploading.

32 kb/s is totally acceptable for voice. The real
morons are those who complain without having 
knowledge .
As another former Demonoid User I've found the audio books the hardest to find.  RIP Demonoid!

Just a note on the 32kbps, if I had encoded it stereo and at a full 44kHz, it would sound bad.  But since I cut both of those in half I get somewhere near the quality of 96kbps, and for voice it's sounds fine.  Try one of the files it won't take long to download, because it's compressed so much.  And I did give the link to where the higher quality files could be found if the quality wasn't good enough for some people.

@MagiciansFR, I'm afraid I can't help there.  If you look at my notes my source was here on the pirate bay.  I'm grateful for the guys like sven_kirk that do post this stuff I just thought I'd try my hand at helping.
